```{r setup, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(janitor)
# create figs
if (!file.exists("figs/")) {
    dir.create("figs/")
}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "figs/",
  fig.height = 3,
  fig.width = 4,
  fig.align = "center",
  fig.ext = "png"
)
```


[Goodhart's law](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goodhart%27s_law).

"What get's measured, get changed."
